Description.Text: Situated less than 200 meters from Gulhane Tram Stop, Raymond Hotel offers non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. Its restaurant serves vegetarian and meat dishes. Each room features comfortable bedding and are fitted with large windows. Guests can grab a cold drink from the well-stocked minibar or make a warm beverage using the tea / coffee maker. At Raymond, guests can make use of the car rental services or request assistance with tickets. The front desk can also help arrange laundry services for guests. The hotel offers Lobby, Reception, Restaurant, Bar, 24-Hour Front Desk, Non-Smoking Rooms, Elevator, Express Check-In/Check-Out, Heating, Design Hotel, Luggage Storage, All Public and Private spaces non-smoking and Air conditioning. Additional Charges: 30 euros Ataturk Airport Transfer.
Hotel Raymond is less than 5 minutes walk from Hagia Sophia and Istanbul Archaeological Museum. Sirkeci Railway Station is less than 600 meters away.

Double / Twin Room - Double / Twin Room offers double or 2 twins with with air conditioning, cable / satellite TV, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.

At the end of a fully scheduled day; when you return your hotel you met your refreshed room. Non-smoking wide room; cleaned everyday regularly. By air condition; your rooms temperature depends on how you want. All rooms has electronic keys. With your personal key card; enter your room, select the temperature you desire, put your luggage on its shelf and your clothes to the wardrobe. You act like you are at home and let the rest to hotel's hands. Single Room - Single Room offers one single bed with air conditioning, cable / satellite TV, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.

From the beginning of first attend to hotel; hotel's well educated specialized staff start to give you the best qualified service just concentrating to your pleasure. Hotel never forget any little detail for your pleasure both at your rooms and the other areas of hotel from the beginning till the end of your visit. Especially your comfort at your room is very important for hotel. Because of this; hotel designed several rooms in several sizes that all answers your every requirements and comfort; contains high standards; although decorated smooth lines by combination of classic and modern styles. Hotel offers guests several options; all including the peaceful atmosphere of hotel as double
